newsitem.title: USA: INTERVIEW-U.S. Office CEO details Mail deal.
newsitem.headline: INTERVIEW-U.S. Office CEO details Mail deal.

text.p: U.S. Office Products chairman and CEO said the company's planned acquisition of Mail Boxes Etc will be a one-for-one exchange of shares as long as U.S. Office's average share price is between $23 and $29.
"It is one-for-one exchange at any price between $23 and $29, the average over the 20 days prior to the closing of the deal," Jonathan Ledecky told Reuters in an interview.
If it is below $23, "we don't have to do the deal, Mail Boxes has the choice. But if the price is above $29, the terms will be ratably reduced on a percentage basis," he said.
